item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 不做播客节目，我不知道自己说话有那么多毛病 in the user temberature at 2022-05-23T12:53:18
item.description:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 我们如何才能开发出变革性的思想工具？ in the user temberature at 2022-05-24T05:50:43
item.description:
in reference to:

Adobe 与许多其他软件公司的共同点是，他们的大部分专利都是防御性的：他们把一些想法申请专利，以便专利恶霸无法通过类似的相互起诉他们。这样与理想情况大相径庭。创新型公司很容易受到专利恶霸的攻击，这些恶霸有庞大的专利库，其中专利的权利要求广泛而模糊，也没有多少细节，不费吹灰之力。但是，一旦创新型公司投入更多来实现一个非常不错的新创意，其他公司总能复制该创新的核心，对其进行合适改变，以合理地规避任何专利侵权。专利制度没有保护应该保护的东西。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 4.6. 暂退法（Dropout） — 动手学深度学习 2.0.0-beta0 documentation in the user temberature at 2022-05-26T05:59:23
item.description:
in reference to:

需要说明的是，暂退法的原始论文提到了一个关于有性繁殖的类比： 神经网络过拟合与每一层都依赖于前一层激活值相关，称这种情况为“共适应性”。 作者认为，暂退法会破坏共适应性，就像有性生殖会破坏共适应的基因一样。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 加粗几个字母之后，英语阅读速度原地起飞，真的这么神奇吗？ in the user temberature at 2022-06-02T07:15:27
item.description:
in reference to:

从这个角度来讲，仿生阅读也未必适用于所有文章。沈阳师范大学曾做过一项文本标注对中文阅读眼动的研究。研究显示，虽然添加高亮会指引和帮助参与者们更好地记忆重点内容、忽略干扰内容，但如果含有错误标识或标识过多，那与无标识的阅读效率几乎是一样的。同时，如果阅读的文本是比较简单的内容，那标示也未必可以提高正确率。

some of the reasons have nothing to do with choosing the “best learning tool,” but with regards to how my workflow and my life have changed.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated MasterHowToLearn - Why 99% People Never Learned How To Learn And How to Become That 1% (I) in the user temberature at 2022-08-08T11:25:54
item.description:
in reference to:

I focused almost entirely on optimizing when I should review the material. My partner made to realize that any spaced repetition algorithm is only half of the story. The other half is how you engage with the material.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated MasterHowToLearn - Why 99% People Never Learned How To Learn And How to Become That 1% (I) in the user temberature at 2022-08-08T11:35:57
item.description:
in reference to:

But here’s the catch: the connection doesn’t happen automatically. You still have to intentionally and consciously think about the big picture to improve your understanding.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated MasterHowToLearn - Why 99% People Never Learned How To Learn And How to Become That 1% (I) in the user temberature at 2022-08-08T11:44:26
item.description:
in reference to:

From now on, my focus on “how to learn” would be shifted from “when should I review this” to “what should I do when I indeed review this?” It’ll be about thinking frameworks and mental models; it’s about “what and how to think” instead of “when to think.”

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 金融消费者如何购买 in the user temberature at 2022-08-30T15:08:35
item.description:
in reference to:

、合同条款复杂、坑多，金融机构抱怨消费者预期高、拒绝承担风险、不理智。究其原因在于，消费者自身和金融机构对于消费者的金融行为都没有认知和把握。 本书全面梳理了消费者金融行为这个重要但“冷门”的主题，话题涉及常见的金融行为，包括投资、保险、借款、储蓄、资金管理、缴税和规避欺诈，综合了各个主题最前沿的研究，并且以案例结合观点展开阐述。 本书讨论了人们金融行为的决定因素和条件，如个体差异和个性、对风险得失的理解、自信、信任、风险偏好、时间偏好、决策制定和自我调控等等，分析了针对不同的金融消费行为，这些因素是如何地影响着

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How many words do you need to speak a language? in the user temberature at 2022-09-01T15:14:21
item.description:
in reference to:

If you learn only 800 of the most frequently-used lemmas in English, you'll be able to understand 75% of the language as it is spoken in normal life.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How long does it take to master a language like a native speaker? in the user temberature at 2022-09-02T03:10:21
item.description:
in reference to:

I find that memorizing a number of ‘filler’ words or sentences can greatly increase your ability to come off as native, as well as knowing some expressions and sayings. Instead of expressing agreement with a simple ‘yes’ you could try responding with “you know what? I Agree!” or “I think I see what you mean”. It’s agreement either way but it sounds a lot more ‘native’.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated dev:client coding:plugin development [Zotero Documentation] in the user temberature at 2022-09-04T17:21:59
item.description:
in reference to:

Depending on your use case, it may be easier to create an external tool that uses the Web API to access Zotero libraries, read from (not write to!) the Zotero client's SQLite database, run ad hoc JavaScript within Zotero, or interact with one of the other APIs that the Zotero client exposes (e.g., for word processor integration).

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated retrieve_pdf_metadata [Zotero Documentation] in the user temberature at 2022-09-04T17:33:59
item.description:
in reference to:

To use this feature, simply drag your existing PDFs into your Zotero library or use the “Store Copy of File” or “Link to File” options from the add new item menu (green plus sign). By default, Zotero will automatically retrieve metadata for each PDF, create an appropriate parent item, and rename the associated file based on the metadata. (You can disable these automatic functions in the General pane of Zotero preferences.)

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.description:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated retrieve_pdf_metadata [Zotero Documentation] in the user temberature at 2022-09-04T17:36:32
item.description:
in reference to:

The Zotero client sends the first few pages of text from the PDF to the web service, which uses a variety of extraction algorithms and known metadata from Crossref, paired with DOI and ISBN lookups, to build a parent item for the PDF.

item.description:

We want to file information in the context we want to rediscover it in, not the context that we found it in.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How to Take Smart Notes by Sonke Ahrens in the user temberature at 2022-11-10T07:02:47
item.description:
in reference to:

What differentiates the Smart Notes method from other note-taking methods is it recognizes that a note is only as useful as the context it is embedded in – its network of associations, relationships, and connections to other ideas.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated How to Take Smart Notes by Sonke Ahrens in the user temberature at 2022-11-10T07:07:43
item.description:
in reference to:

Don’t simply copy your notes into a rough draft, but translate them into something coherent and embed them into the context of your argument. As you detect any holes in your argument, fill them in, or change your argument.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated (91 封私信 / 80 条消息) 石墨烯电暖产品是真的还是假的？ - 知乎 in the user temberature at 2022-11-11T17:12:14
item.description:
in reference to:

石墨烯地暖目前最大的问题在「涂层」，如果不去做好「封装」，长时间会氧化、粉化及脱落，不可能做到耐用 20 万小时。加上采用丝印工艺，两端涂布不均匀，容易产生「电阻差」，功率不到几年就衰退了，结果就是更耗电而你不自知！
